[SRCH].q: Instruct: Given a scientific query, identify relevant scientific documents. query: {content}

qwen3_embedding_base_prompt.[CLF]: Instruct: Classify a given scientific document. Document: {content}
qwen3_embedding_base_prompt.[RGN]: Instruct: Given a scientific document, predict a metric. Document: {content}
qwen3_embedding_base_prompt.[PRX]: Instruct: Given a scientific document find similar scientific documents. Document: {content}

qwen3_embedding_prx_from_code_repo.SciDocs Cite: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, retrieve paper abstracts that are cited by the given paper. {content}

NFCorpus.q: Given a question, retrieve relevant documents that best answer the question. {content}

TREC-CoVID.q: Given a query on COVID-19, retrieve documents that answer the query. {content}

qwen3_embedding_prx_from_code_repo.Same Author Detection: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, retrieve papers that have the same author as the given paper. {content}
qwen3_embedding_prx_from_code_repo.Highly Influential Citations: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, retrieve papers that are highly influential citations in the given paper. {content}
qwen3_embedding_prx_from_code_repo.RELISH: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, retrieve papers that are relevant to the given paper. {content}

qwen3_training_prompts.cite_pred: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, predict the number of citations it has received. {content}
qwen3_training_prompts.year_pred: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, predict the year in which it was published. {content}
qwen3_training_prompts.mesh: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, identify the most appropriate Medical Subject Heading (MeSH) to it. {content}
qwen3_training_prompts.fos: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, select all applicable fields of study for it. {content}

search.q: Given a query, retrieve relevant scientific papers using their title and abstract. {content}

qwen3_training_prompts.s2and: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, find other scientific papers by the same author. {content}
qwen3_training_prompts.cite_context: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, find other scientific papers which are highly influenced by it. {content}
qwen3_training_prompts.specter: Given a scientific paper title and abstract, find other scientific papers which have a citation relationship with it. {content}
